title: Discovery QRD-046: recursive_composition

core_mechanism: Core mechanism: A breakthrough deterministic modular architecture with pioneering self-referential composition of Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(HybridClassicalQuantum) enabling first-mover advantage through modular feedback loops through 2 interaction patterns

formulation.pseudocode:
function apply_recursive_composition(system):
  return transform(system, Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(HybridClassicalQuantum))
